enWisdom: Trusting in Allah is an asset

Wisdom: أَصْلُ قُوَّةِ الْقَلْبِ التَّوَكُّلُ عَلَى اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The root of the heart’s strength is in putting [one’s] trust in Allah

Wisdom: بِحُسْنِ التَّوَكُّلِ يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى حُسْنِ الْإِيقَانِ
enWisdom: It is through the strength of one’s trust in Allah that the level of one’s faith is evinced
One who trusts in Allah does not get worried

Wisdom: مَنْ فَوَّضَ أَمْرَهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ سَدَّدَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever leaves his matter to Allah, He resolves it [for him]

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ مُتَوَكِّلًا لَمْ يَعْدَمِ الْإِعَانَةَ
enWisdom: One who puts his trust in Allah will never lose His support

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَّمَ أَمْرَهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ اسْتَظْهَرَ
enWisdom: One who submits his affair to Allah is supported [by Him]
There is no trouble [and distress] for the one who trusts in Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ تَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ تَسَهَّلَتْ لَهُ الصِّعَابُ
enWisdom: Whoever trusts in Allah, difficulties become easy for him

Wisdom: مَنْ تَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ أَضَاءَتْ لَهُ الشُّبُهَاتُ وَكُفِيَ الْمَئُونَاتِ وَأَمِنَ التَّبِعَاتِ
enWisdom: Whoever trusts in Allah, doubts get cleared for him, his sustenance is catered for and he is saved from tribulations

Wisdom: مَنْ تَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ ذَلَّتْ لَهُ الصِّعَابُ وَتَسَهَّلَتْ عَلَيْهِ الْأَسْبَابُ وَتَبَوَّأَ الْخَفْضَ وَالْكَرَامَةَ
enWisdom: Whoever trusts in Allah, difficulties become tolerable for him, means become easy for him and he enters into [a place of] comfort and honour

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَتَخَلَّصُ مِنْ عَنَاءِ الْحِرْصِ مَنْ لَمْ يَصْدُقْ تَوَكُّلُهُ
enWisdom: How can there be relief from the suffering of greed for one who has not truly trusted [in Allah]?
